A Accenture report found that...

In 1984, 37% of computer science majors in the U.S. were women. Today only 18% are. Why?

These women literally changed the world. Do you know them?

All throughout history, women have been changing the world through science and techynology. Believe it or not, you may not know their names. Watchiu this video to learn about some of the most extraordinary remale constributions to science and technology.
